DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Effectiveness ( Immunogenicity ) Safety 'GC1107 ' Administered Intramuscularly Healthy Children
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , double blind , multicenter , phase Ⅱ/Ⅲ study
